Package it.polimi.ingsw.view.gui.customcomponents

Class MyShelfieTriangleButton

java.lang.Object
javafx.scene.Node
javafx.scene.Parent
javafx.scene.layout.Region
javafx.scene.layout.Pane
javafx.scene.layout.StackPane
it.polimi.ingsw.view.gui.customcomponents.MyShelfieTriangleButton
All Implemented Interfaces:
MyShelfieComponent, javafx.css.Styleable, javafx.event.EventTarget
public class MyShelfieTriangleButton extends javafx.scene.layout.StackPane implements MyShelfieComponent
A custom triangular button component in the Shelfie GUI.
Author:
Tommaso Trabacchin, Melanie Tonarelli, Emanuele Valsecchi, Adem Shehi

  • Field Details

    • TRIANGLE_IMAGE_PATH

      private static final String TRIANGLE_IMAGE_PATH
      The file path to the triangle image used for the button.
      See Also:
      • Constant Field Values

      private boolean entered
      Flag indicating whether the button is currently in the "entered" state.

    • clicked

      private boolean clicked
      Flag indicating whether the button is currently in the "clicked" state.

      private boolean active
      Flag indicating whether the button is currently in the "active" state.

    • iconPane

      private final javafx.scene.layout.Pane iconPane
      The pane that contains the icon for the button.

      private javafx.animation.PathTransition pathTransition

  • Constructor Details

    • MyShelfieTriangleButton

      public MyShelfieTriangleButton()
      Creates a MyShelfieTriangleButton with default settings. It sets up the required interactions, style, and initializes the icon pane.

  • Method Details

    • initPathTransition

      private void initPathTransition()
      Initializes the PathTransition for the MyShelfieTriangleButton. It creates a new PathTransition instance and stops it.

    • setDefaultInteractionsProperty

      private void setDefaultInteractionsProperty()
      Sets the default interaction properties for the MyShelfieTriangleButton. It sets the entered, clicked, and active flags to their default values.

    • handleMouseExited

      private void handleMouseExited(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent mouseEvent)
      Event handler for the mouse exit event. It handles the behavior when the mouse exits the MyShelfieTriangleButton. If the button is active and not clicked, it resets to default decorations and reverses the path transition if not entered.
      Parameters:
      mouseEvent - The MouseEvent associated with the mouse exit event.

    • handleMouseEnter

      private void handleMouseEnter(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent mouseEvent)
      Event handler for the mouse enter event. It handles the behavior when the mouse enters the MyShelfieTriangleButton. If the button is active and not clicked, it applies the MyShelfieBloom decoration and initiates the path transition.
      Parameters:
      mouseEvent - The MouseEvent associated with the mouse enter event.

    • handleMousePressed

      private void handleMousePressed(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent mouseEvent)
      Event handler for the mouse pressed event. It handles the behavior when the mouse is pressed on the MyShelfieTriangleButton. If the button is active, it toggles the clicked flag and applies the MyShelfieGlow decoration if not clicked.
      Parameters:
      mouseEvent - The MouseEvent associated with the mouse pressed event.

    • handleMouseReleased

      private void handleMouseReleased(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent mouseEvent)
      Event handler for the mouse released event. It handles the behavior when the mouse is released on the MyShelfieTriangleButton. If the button is active and not clicked, it resets to default decorations.
      Parameters:
      mouseEvent - The MouseEvent associated with the mouse released event.

    • doPathTransition

      private void doPathTransition()
      Initiates a path transition animation for the MyShelfieTriangleButton. It creates a PathTransition with a specified path and properties, and starts the animation. The animation moves the iconPane from its initial position to a final position.

    • setInactive

      public void setInactive()
      Sets the MyShelfieTriangleButton to an inactive state. It updates the interaction properties, sets the active flag to false, resets the decorations to default, applies the MyShelfieOpaque decoration, and reverses the path transition.

    • setActive

      public void setActive()
      Sets the MyShelfieTriangleButton to an active state. It updates the interaction properties and applies the MyShelfieOpaque decoration.

    • isActive

      public boolean isActive()
      Checks if the MyShelfieTriangleButton is active.
      Returns:
      true if the button is active, false otherwise.

    • reverseState

      public void reverseState()
      Reverses the state of the MyShelfieTriangleButton. It checks the current opacity and applies the MyShelfieOpaque decoration if necessary, updates the interaction properties, resets the decorations to default, and reverses the path transition.

    • reversePathTransition

      private void reversePathTransition()
      Reverses the path transition animation. If the path transition is not stopped, it plays the animation in reverse.

    • getCustomizedNode

      public javafx.scene.Node getCustomizedNode()
      Retrieve the element that has to be customized
      Specified by:
      getCustomizedNode in interface MyShelfieComponent
      Returns:
      the element that needs to be customized

    • getBaseDecorations

      public List<MyShelfieDecoration> getBaseDecorations()
      Retrieves the set of default decorations that are applied on a customized component
      Specified by:
      getBaseDecorations in interface MyShelfieComponent
      Returns:
      the set
